sprint_goal: Establish the foundational security and user management framework, including login and Role-Based Access Control (RBAC).
Implement core master data models for Customers, Drivers, Vehicles, Routes, and Materials.
Complete master data validations and deliver the core trip creation functionality.
Enable trip assignment with all business rule validations and launch the basic Driver Portal with login.
Develop core driver on-trip actions: viewing trips, starting trips, and logging critical events, plus the manager's resolution workflow.
